shinybulma 0.0.1
  • Reference

Add a column

Source: R/bulma-column.R
bulmaColumns.Rd

Add a column

bulmaColumns(
  ...,
  gapless = FALSE,
  centered = FALSE,
  multiline = FALSE,
  mobile = FALSE,
  tablet = FALSE,
  desktop = FALSE
)

Arguments

...

any element.
gapless

if TRUE remove gaps between columns.
centered

to center columns.
multiline

to create a flexible, centered list.
mobile, tablet, desktop

set to force columns on device.

See also

bulmaColumn

Examples

if(interactive()){
ui <- bulmaPage(
  bulmaContainer(
    bulmaColumns(
      bulmaColumn(
        bulmaTitle("2 columns")
      ),
      bulmaColumn(
        plotOutput("plot")
      )
    )
  )
)

server <- function(input, output){
  output$plot <- renderPlot({
    plot(1:20, rnorm(20), type = "l")
  })
}

shiny::shinyApp(ui, server)
}
